Access All Areas, To unlock all tracks, speeds and championships enter the following code
Aggressive Opponents, To make all opponents attack all the time, enter the following code
Granite Car, To enable granite car mode enter the following code
Helium, To make all the characters talk in a high pitched voice, enter the following code
Infinite Boost, To give your vehicle a permanently full boost bar enter the following code
Invulnerability, To give your vehicle unlimited health in races enter the following code
Last Three Cars, To enable the last three cars for play enter the following code
Micro Cars, To enable micro cars mode enter the following code
Monster Truck, To enable monster truck mode enter the following code
Moon Gravity, To enable moon gravity enter the following code
Overkill, To make all your Car-fu moves do total damage enter the following code
Pacificist Opponents, To disable Car-fu for all opponents enter the following code
Psychedelic, To put the game in to psychedelic color mode enter the following code
Super Speed, To enable super fast racing mode enter the following code
Tiny Opponents, To enable tiny opponents mode enter the following code
Tiny Player, To enable tiny player mode enter the following code
Treacle, To make the whole game run in slow motion enter the following code
Up-Sized Cars, To enable huge cars mode enter the following code
